Part IV 
All Taxpayers 
Note: 
Enter on lines 19 through 23 all income, including noncash income, you earned and actually or constructively received during 
 
 
 
 
 
constructively received the income. 
If you are a cash basis taxpayer, report on Form 1040 all income you received in 2013, no matter when you performed  
the service.
